articles.title: Jong Il Peak Cup
articles.content:
Jong Il Peak Cup
    Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The 2nd National Taekwon-do Championship for "Jong Il Peak Cup" was held at the Taekwon-do hall here over March 11-14.   Attending the championship were nearly 300 players selected from among Taekwon-do circle members at provincial (municipal) extra-mural sports schools and schoolchildren's palaces and houses.   South Hamgyong Province placed first in the all round championship.   The players registered good results by displaying high technological movements and special techniques of Taekwon-do.

articles.title: Compensation to former "comfort women" demanded
articles.content:
Compensation to former "comfort women" demanded
   Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The International Labor Organization reportedly worked out a report some time ago demanding that the Japanese government compensate to former "comfort women for the army" who were taken away and forced to serve the old Japanese army as sex slaves during World War II.   A large number of "comfort women" have refused to receive deceptive compensation channelled by Japan's non-governmental fund, the report said, describing the refusal as an expression of their dissatisfaction at the Japanese government which makes no governmental compensation.   It strongly urged the Japanese government to take up the compensation as an urgent task, recalling the fact that the sufferers are growing older in over 50 years after the war.

articles.title: National meeting of scientists and technicians to be held
articles.content:
National meeting of scientists and technicians to be held
   Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A national meeting of scientists and technicians will be held here at the end of this month.   The meeting is to review the achievements and experience made in the development of the nation's science and technology over the past years. It will also discuss the tasks and ways for bringing about a turn in the development of up-to-date science and technology in keeping with needs of the time when the building of a powerful socialist state is going on.   Attending it will be scientists and technicians who have contributed to developing the nation's science and technology and making the national economy Juche-oriented, modern and science-based.   The 14th National Scientific and Technological Festival will take place in parallel with the meeting.

"Declaration on national independence" issued
articles.content:
"Declaration on national independence" issued
   Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- 80 personages of South Korea from all walks of life jointly made public a "declaration on national independence" on March 1 at a meeting sponsored by the "National Meeting for Independent and Peaceful Reunification" on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the March 1 Popular Uprising, the newspaper Hangyore said.   The declaration said their eventual national independence rests with the nation's reconciliation and reunification, stressing they would do their utmost to build a reunified country on the principle of independence, peace and great national unity.
